LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_1: SELECT cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, days.day day, days.day_type_id day_type_id, days.description description, dt.is_day_off_type day_off FROM ( SELECT proj.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, b.day day, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != CHR(1) THEN p.day_type_id ELSE b.day_type_id END  day_type_id, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != CHR(1) THEN p.description ELSE b.description END  description FROM cdb_calendar_entry b CROSS JOIN cdbpcs_project proj LEFT JOIN cdb_calendar_proj_entry_v p ON b.day = p.day AND p.cdb_project_id = proj.cdb_project_id WHERE proj.calendar_profile_id = b.calendar_profile_id AND proj.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND proj.calendar_profile_id != CHR(1) AND b.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND b.calendar_profile_id != CHR(1) AND (b.personalnummer IS NULL OR b.personalnummer = CHR(1)) ) days JOIN  cdb_day_type dt ON  days.day_type_id = dt.day_type_id
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_5: SELECT  cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, days.day day, days.day_type_id day_type_id, days.description description, dt.is_day_off_type day_off FROM ( SELECT proj.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, b.day day, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != '' THEN p.day_type_id ELSE b.day_type_id END  day_type_id, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != '' THEN p.description ELSE b.description END  description FROM cdb_calendar_entry b CROSS JOIN cdbpcs_project proj LEFT JOIN cdb_calendar_proj_entry_v p ON b.day = p.day AND p.cdb_project_id = proj.cdb_project_id WHERE proj.calendar_profile_id = b.calendar_profile_id AND proj.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND proj.calendar_profile_id != '' AND b.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND b.calendar_profile_id != '' AND (b.personalnummer IS NULL OR b.personalnummer = '') ) days JOIN  cdb_day_type dt ON  days.day_type_id = dt.day_type_id
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_6: SELECT cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, days.day day, days.day_type_id day_type_id, days.description description, dt.is_day_off_type day_off FROM ( SELECT proj.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, b.day day, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != '' THEN p.day_type_id ELSE b.day_type_id END  day_type_id, CASE WHEN p.cdb_project_id IS NOT NULL AND p.cdb_project_id != '' THEN p.description ELSE b.description END  description FROM cdb_calendar_entry b CROSS JOIN cdbpcs_project proj LEFT JOIN cdb_calendar_proj_entry_v p ON b.day = p.day AND p.cdb_project_id = proj.cdb_project_id WHERE proj.calendar_profile_id = b.calendar_profile_id AND proj.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND proj.calendar_profile_id != '' AND b.calendar_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND b.calendar_profile_id != '' AND (b.personalnummer IS NULL OR b.personalnummer = '') ) days JOIN  cdb_day_type dt ON  days.day_type_id = dt.day_type_id

LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_1:
SELECT calendar_profile_id, day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_calendar_entry
    WHERE day_type_id=1 AND personalnummer IS NULL
UNION SELECT '', day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_person_calendar_v WHERE day_off=0
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_5:
SELECT calendar_profile_id, day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_calendar_entry
    WHERE day_type_id=1 AND personalnummer IS NULL
UNION SELECT '', day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_person_calendar_v WHERE day_off=0
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_6:
SELECT calendar_profile_id, day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_calendar_entry
    WHERE day_type_id=1 AND personalnummer IS NULL
UNION SELECT '', day, personalnummer
    FROM cdb_person_calendar_v WHERE day_off=0

DATA.uview_col_aliases: subject_id, description_de, description_en, description_cs, description_es, description_fr, description_it, description_ja, description_ko, description_pl, description_pt, description_tr, description_zh, subject_type, subject_name_de, subject_name_en, subject_name_cs, subject_name_es, subject_name_fr, subject_name_it, subject_name_ja, subject_name_ko, subject_name_pl, subject_name_pt, subject_name_tr, subject_name_zh, cdb_project_id, order_by, is_resource

LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_1:
SELECT a.subject_id subject_id,  b.name description_de,  b.name description_en, b.name description_cs, b.name description_es, b.name description_fr, b.name description_it, b.name description_ja, b.name description_ko, b.name description_pl, b.name description_pt, b.name description_tr, b.name description_zh, a.subject_type subject_type, b.name subject_name_de, b.name subject_name_en, b.name subject_name_cs, b.name subject_name_es, b.name subject_name_fr, b.name subject_name_it, b.name subject_name_ja, b.name subject_name_ko, b.name subject_name_pl, b.name subject_name_pt, b.name subject_name_tr, b.name subject_name_zh, a.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id,  1 order_by, b.is_resource is_resource
FROM  cdbpcs_subject a, angestellter b
WHERE  a.subject_type = 'Person' AND a.subject_id = b.personalnummer
UNION
SELECT  p.role_id subject_id,  d.description description_de,  d.description_ml_en description_en, d.description_ml_cs description_cs, d.description_ml_es description_es, d.description_ml_fr description_fr, d.description_ml_it description_it, d.description_ml_ja description_ja, d.description_ml_ko description_ko, d.description_ml_pl description_pl, d.description_ml_pt description_pt, d.description_ml_tr description_tr, d.description_ml_zh description_zh, 'PCS Role' subject_type, d.name_ml_de subject_name_de,  d.name_ml_en subject_name_en, d.name_ml_cs subject_name_cs, d.name_ml_es subject_name_es, d.name_ml_fr subject_name_fr, d.name_ml_it subject_name_it, d.name_ml_ja subject_name_ja, d.name_ml_ko subject_name_ko, d.name_ml_pl subject_name_pl, d.name_ml_pt subject_name_pt, d.name_ml_tr subject_name_tr, d.name_ml_zh subject_name_zh, cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, 2 order_by, 1 is_resource
FROM cdbpcs_prj_role p, cdbpcs_role_def d
WHERE p.role_id = d.name
UNION
SELECT a.subject_id subject_id, b.name description_de,  b.name description_en, b.name description_cs, b.name description_es, b.name description_fr, b.name description_it, b.name description_ja, b.name description_ko, b.name description_pl, b.name description_pt, b.name description_tr, b.name description_zh, a.subject_type subject_type, b.name subject_name_de, b.name subject_name_en, b.name subject_name_cs, b.name subject_name_es, b.name subject_name_fr, b.name subject_name_it, b.name subject_name_ja, b.name subject_name_ko, b.name subject_name_pl, b.name subject_name_pt, b.name subject_name_tr, b.name subject_name_zh, c.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id,  3 order_by, b.is_resource is_resource
FROM cdb_global_subj a, angestellter b, cdbpcs_subject c
WHERE c.subject_id = a.role_id AND a.subject_id = b.personalnummer
UNION
SELECT a.subject_id subject_id, b.description description_de, b.description_ml_en description_en, b.description_ml_cs description_cs, b.description_ml_es description_es, b.description_ml_fr description_fr, b.description_ml_it description_it, b.description_ml_ja description_ja, b.description_ml_ko description_ko, b.description_ml_pl description_pl, b.description_ml_pt description_pt, b.description_ml_tr description_tr, b.description_ml_zh description_zh, a.subject_type, b.name_de subject_name_de, b.name_en subject_name_en, b.name_cs subject_name_cs, b.name_es subject_name_es, b.name_fr subject_name_fr, b.name_it subject_name_it, b.name_ja subject_name_ja, b.name_ko subject_name_ko, b.name_pl subject_name_pl, b.name_pt subject_name_pt, b.name_tr subject_name_tr, b.name_zh subject_name_zh, a.cdb_project_id cdb_project_id, 4 order_by, 1 is_resource
FROM cdbpcs_subject a, cdb_global_role b
WHERE a.subject_id = b.role_id

LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_1:
SELECT t.cdb_project_id2 pred_pid, t.task_id2 pred_tid, t.cdb_project_id succ_pid, t.task_id succ_tid, t.gap,
CASE
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 1 AND a.early_position = 0 AND b.early_position = 1 THEN -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 0 AND a.early_position = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'AA') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 1 AND b.early_position = 1 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'EE') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA') THEN  -1
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.status = 180 THEN a.days_fcast
ELSE 0 END new_gap
FROM cdbpcs_taskrel t
JOIN cdbpcs_task a ON t.cdb_project_id2 = a.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id2 = a.task_id
JOIN cdbpcs_task b ON t.cdb_project_id = b.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id = b.task_id
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_5:
SELECT t.cdb_project_id2 pred_pid, t.task_id2 pred_tid, t.cdb_project_id succ_pid, t.task_id succ_tid, t.gap,
CASE
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 1 AND a.early_position = 0 AND b.early_position = 1 THEN -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 0 AND a.early_position = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'AA') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 1 AND b.early_position = 1 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'EE') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA') THEN  -1
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.status = 180 THEN a.days_fcast
ELSE 0 END new_gap
FROM cdbpcs_taskrel t
JOIN cdbpcs_task a ON t.cdb_project_id2 = a.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id2 = a.task_id
JOIN cdbpcs_task b ON t.cdb_project_id = b.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id = b.task_id
LONGTEXTS.cdbdd_userdefined_view_txt_6:
SELECT t.cdb_project_id2 pred_pid, t.task_id2 pred_tid, t.cdb_project_id succ_pid, t.task_id succ_tid, t.gap,
CASE
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'AE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.start_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EE' THEN b.end_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
    WHEN t.rel_type = 'EA' THEN b.start_time_fcast_offset - a.end_time_fcast_offset
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 1 AND a.early_position = 0 AND b.early_position = 1 THEN -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 1 AND b.milestone = 0 AND a.early_position = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'AA') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 1 AND b.early_position = 1 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA', 'EE') THEN  -1
    WHEN a.milestone = 0 AND b.milestone = 0 AND t.rel_type IN ('EA') THEN  -1
ELSE 0 END +
CASE
    WHEN a.status = 180 THEN a.days_fcast
ELSE 0 END new_gap
FROM cdbpcs_taskrel t
JOIN cdbpcs_task a ON t.cdb_project_id2 = a.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id2 = a.task_id
JOIN cdbpcs_task b ON t.cdb_project_id = b.cdb_project_id AND t.task_id = b.task_id
